messages.message:
@Aaron Tami @Mohit @will
I ran into the same error. I fixed by using an environment variable.

```You can set the following environment variable in ~/.bash_profile or ~/.bashrc 

NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048

source ~/.bash_profile or source ~/.bashrc```
Note that zsh is the new default for Macs so if you havenâ€™t explicitly set your shell to bash or migrated it will need to go in your .profile, or .zshrc :)
